events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to know how I can get a refund or exchange it.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for return and refund options.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund and exchange query for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Emily, here to help you with your jacket refund or exchange. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund or exchange, I need the order number and the reason for the return, aside from the sizing issue.
The order number is 123456789 and the jacket is too small even after checking the size chart. I prefer a refund if exchange isn’t possible.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you return the jacket to us. I will send you the return label via email shortly.
That sounds great, thanks! I'll wait for the return label email and send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the prompt help and smooth process!
We’re glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now. Have a wonderful day!
